project/src/connection.c

00001 /**
00002  * @file connection.c
00003  *
00004  * @date   2009-04-24
00005  * @author Jean-Lou Dupont
00006  *
00007  * \section Overview
00008  *                      This module implements the ``connection`` aspect:
00009  *
00010  *                      - opening
00011  *                      - closing
00012  *
00013  *                      A limited number of connections are supported at any point
00014  *                      in time. When a connection is closed, it is queued for
00015  *                      later deletion: the connection can not be used for any
00016  *                      access from this point onwards.
00017  *
00018  * \section Connections
00019  *
00020  *                      From a client operation point of view, the connection table
00021  *                      is only locked whilst performing:
00022  *
00023  *                      - ``open`` and ``close`` connection operations
00024  *                      - ``add`` and ``remove`` subscription operations
00025  *
00026  *                      at which times the return code LITM_CODE_BUSY might be used
00027  *                      to signal to the client to try again later. This behavior is
00028  *                      necessary in order for the ``switch`` to be in control
00029  *                      position, thus simplifying the architecture and API.
00030  *
00031  *                      Since the ``switch`` is in control, the connection table
00032  *                      is also held in locked state whilst dispatching envelopes
00033  *                      to clients.
00034  *
00035  *
00036  * \section Deletion
00037  *
00038  *                      Connection deletion is performed in the following manner:
00039  *
00040  *                      - the connection's status is changed to "PENDING_DELETION"
00041  *                      - the connection identifier is placed in a stack (pending deletion)
00042  *                      - the ``switch`` inspects the said stack at regular interval
00043  *
00044  *
00045  */
00046 #include <pthread.h>
00047 #include <errno.h>
00048 
00049 #include "litm.h"
00050 #include "connection.h"
00051 #include "queue.h"
00052 #include "logger.h"
00053 
00054 // PRIVATE
00055 int __litm_connection_get_index(litm_connection *(table)[], litm_connection *conn);
00056 int __litm_connection_get_free_index(litm_connection *(table)[]);
00057 litm_connection *__litm_connection_get_ptr(int connection_index);
00058 void _litm_connections_init(void);
00059

00063         // ACTIVE CONNECTIONS
00064         // ------------------
00065 pthread_mutex_t  _connections_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00066 litm_connection *_connections[LITM_CONNECTION_MAX];
00067 
00068         // CONNECTIONS PENDING DELETION
00069         // ----------------------------
00070 pthread_mutex_t  _connections_pending_deletion_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
00071 litm_connection *_connections_pending_deletion[LITM_CONNECTION_MAX];
00072 
00073 
00074 int __connections_initialized = 0;
00075

00079 /**
00080  * Returns the connection id
00081  *
00082  * @return -1 on error
00083  */
00084         int
00085 litm_connection_get_id(litm_connection *conn) {
00086 
00087         if (NULL==conn) {
00088                 return -1;
00089         }
00090 
00091         return conn->id;
00092 }//
00093 
00094 /**
00095  * Opens a ``connection``
00096  *
00097  */
00098         litm_code
00099 litm_connection_open(litm_connection **conn) {
00100 
00101         return litm_connection_open_ex( conn, 0);
00102 
00103 }//
00104 
00105 
00106         litm_code
00107 litm_connection_open_ex(litm_connection **conn, int id) {
00108 
00109         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: BEGIN");
00110 
00111         int target_index, code;
00112 
00113         code = pthread_mutex_trylock( &_connections_mutex );
00114         if (EBUSY==code) {
00115                 return LITM_CODE_BUSY;
00116         }
00117 
00118         if (1!=__connections_initialized) {
00119                 _litm_connections_init();
00120                 __connections_initialized=1;
00121         }
00122 
00123         target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index(_connections);
00124         if (-1 == target_index) {
00125                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00126                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00127         }
00128 
00129         *conn= (litm_connection *) malloc(sizeof(litm_connection));
00130         if (NULL==*conn) {
00131                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00132                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00133         }
00134 
00135         queue *q = queue_create(id);
00136         if (NULL==q) {
00137                 free(*conn);
00138                 pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00139                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC;
00140         }
00141 
00142 
00143         _connections[target_index] = *conn;
00144         (*conn)->received = 0;
00145         (*conn)->released = 0;
00146         (*conn)->sent     = 0;
00147         (*conn)->id       = id;
00148         (*conn)->input_queue = q;
00149         (*conn)->status = LITM_CONNECTION_STATUS_ACTIVE;
00150 
00151         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: OPENED, index[%u] ref[%x], q[%x]", target_index, *conn, q);
00152 
00153 
00154         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00155 
00156         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_open: END");
00157         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00158 
00159 }//
00160 
00161         litm_code
00162 litm_connection_close(litm_connection *conn) {
00163 
00164         if (NULL==conn) {
00165                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION;
00166         }
00167 
00168         // FLAG the connection has been about to be deleted
00169         //  Hopefully, this doesn't cause too much blockage...
00170         pthread_mutex_lock( &_connections_mutex );
00171                 conn->status = LITM_CONNECTION_STATUS_PENDING_DELETION;
00172         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );
00173 
00174 
00175         pthread_mutex_lock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00176 
00177                 int target_index = __litm_connection_get_free_index(_connections_pending_deletion);
00178 
00179                 if (-1 == target_index) {
00180                         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00181                         return LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS;
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 _connections_pending_deletion[target_index] = conn;
00185 
00186                 DEBUG_LOG(LOG_INFO, "litm_connection_close: PENDING conn[%x]", conn);
00187 
00188         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_pending_deletion_mutex );
00189 
00190         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00191 }//

00193         litm_connection *
00194 __litm_connection_get_ptr(int connection_index) {
00195 
00196         if ((LITM_CONNECTION_MAX <= connection_index) || 0==connection_index)
00197                 return NULL;
00198 
00199         return _connections[connection_index];
00200 }//
00201 
00202         int
00203 __litm_connection_get_index(litm_connection *(table)[], litm_connection *conn) {
00204 
00205         int index, result = -1; //pessimistic
00206 
00207         for (index=1; index<LITM_CONNECTION_MAX; index++ ) {
00208                 if ( conn == table[index] ) {
00209                         result = index;
00210                         break;
00211                 }
00212         }//for
00213 
00214         return result;
00215 }//
00216

00218 
00219 /**
00220  * Verifies if a `spot` is available in
00221  *  the connection map OR -1 if none.
00222  *
00223  */
00224         int
00225 __litm_connection_get_free_index(litm_connection *(table)[]) {
00226 
00227         int index, result=-1;
00228         for (index=1; index<LITM_CONNECTION_MAX; index++) {
00229                 if (NULL==table[index]) {
00230                         result=index;
00231                         break;
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 
00235         return index;
00236 }//

00253 _litm_connections_unlock(void) {
00254 
00255         pthread_mutex_unlock( &_connections_mutex );

00258 /**
00259  * @see _litm_connection_validate_safe
00260  *
00261  */
00262         int
00263 _litm_connection_validate(litm_connection *conn) {
00264 
00265         if (EBUSY==_litm_connections_trylock())
00266                 return -1;
00267 
00268                 int returnCode = _litm_connection_validate_safe( conn );
00269 
00270         _litm_connections_unlock();
00271 
00272         return returnCode;
00273 }
00274 
00275 /**
00276  * Connection validation
00277  *
00278  * @return 0 => not active
00279  * @return 1 => active
00280  *
00281  */
00282         int
00283 _litm_connection_validate_safe(litm_connection *conn) {
00284 
00285         int i, returnCode = 0;
00286         for (i=1;i<=LITM_CONNECTION_MAX;i++) {
00287                 if ( conn == _connections[i] ) {
00288                         returnCode = 1;
00289                         break;
00290                 }
00291         }
00292 
00293         return returnCode;
00294 }//
00295 
00296         void
00297 _litm_connection_lock(litm_connection *conn) {
00298 
00299         pthread_mutex_lock( conn->input_queue->mutex );
00300 
00301 }//
00302 
00303         void
00304 _litm_connection_unlock(litm_connection *conn) {
00305 
00306         pthread_mutex_unlock( conn->input_queue->mutex );
00307 }

00316         void
00317 _litm_connection_signal_all(void) {
00318 
00319         litm_connection *conn;
00320         queue *q;
00321         int i;
00322         for (i=1;i<=LITM_CONNECTION_MAX;i++) {
00323                 conn = _connections[i];
00324                 if (NULL!=conn) {
00325                 q = _connections[i]->input_queue;
00326                         queue_signal( q );
00327                 }
00328         }
00329 
00330 }//
00331 
00332         void
00333 _litm_connections_init(void) {
00334 
00335         int i;
00336         for (i=1;i<=LITM_CONNECTION_MAX;i++) {
00337                 _connections[i]=NULL;
00338         }
00339 
00340 }//
